name: Slime Tangler
description:
In this game, the player simultaneously controls two cute little slimes, with the aim of helping them occupy their corresponding goals at the same time to beat each level. The two slimes are quantum-entangled: whatever pink does, green does the opposite! Use this quirk to help the slimes through 17 different levels!

This game was done by both squidballs and Gorochu2122
